ReportText: PROCEDURE: Chest-2 views. INDICATION: Cough and fever x3 days. COMPARISON: None FINDINGS: PA and lateral views show the heart size and shape to be normal. The mediastinum is not widened. The pulmonary vascularity is normal. The lungs are well-expanded and clear. The costophrenic angles are sharp. No acute osseous abnormality is demonstrated. IMPRESSION: 1. There is no active heart or lung disease. This report was dictated at [PHONE]_LEW2 and electronically signed by [[PERSONALNAME], M.D. on 02/03/2019 11:20 AM CST.
